actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain chemical compounds.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on 2,4-dicumylphenol. Directs the Customs Service, upon proper request, to retroactively liquidate or reliquidate, for a specified period of time, any entry of such chemical compound or its withdrawal from warehouse as if duty- free treatment applied to it.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain chemical compounds.
